cui_name: Optic Nerve Disorder with Autosomal Dominant Inheritance
reasoning: Rare autosomal dominant optic neuropathy. Estimated incidence <1 per 100k based on genetic registry data. Includes conditions like autosomal dominant optic atrophy (OPA1). Limited epidemiological data available.
source: Alexander C et al. (2000). OPA1, encoding a dynamin-related GTPase, is mutated in autosomal dominant optic atrophy. Hum Mol Genet. 9(10):1461-1468
